p: The value of the first component is higher than 91.6% in the three PCA showing that the most of the variance is expressed along the x-axis. It is worth noting that the shift along x-axis of the clusters representing subsequent days of samples preservation corresponds to increasing values of discrimination indexes (DIs) of days 3, 6, 9, and 12, respective to day 0 of the correlation matrixes (CMs) ( Table 3, Table 4 and Table 5).
